title: How to Get Coins in Plants vs Zombies 2

steps.headline: Launch Plants vs Zombies 2.
steps.description: Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Select a World.
steps.description: There are many Worlds within the game. Each World has its own theme, set of plants, and set of zombies. You can choose among Ancient Egypt, Pirate Seas, Wild West, Far Future, Dark Ages, Big Wave Beach, and Frostbite Caves, with many more to come. Swipe left and right on the screen to select the World you want to play, and tap on it.

steps.headline: Select a level.
steps.description: Within each World are many levels. Each level can have a different set of zombies and goals. You can only play a level you’ve already completed or the level right after the last one you’ve completed. Tap on the button with the level number to start the game.

steps.headline: Select plants.
steps.description: On the level where you can select your own plants, you will be presented with your inventory of plants. Tap on the ones you want to use for the game. Be sure you have a plant that will give you sun and plants that can attack and defend your base.

steps.headline: Tap on the “Let’s Rock!” button to begin your game.
steps.description: Start by planting the plant that will give you sun, and then strategize from there.

steps.headline: Collect coins.
steps.description: Some zombies you defeat will give out coins in return. Watch for these coins during game play. When you see one, tap on it to collect it. The corresponding amount will be added to your coin bank. The coins can be in silver or gold. Silver coins are worth 10 coins and gold coins are worth 100 coins. On rarer occasions, you will see a zombie drop a blue diamond. Tap on it to collect it. Blue diamonds are worth 500 coins.

steps.headline: Preserve the lawnmowers.
steps.description: Lawnmowers are you final defense against the zombie attacks. When you finish the game without using them, each lawnmower left will be changed to a silver coin, adding to your coin bank.

steps.headline: Defeat the zombies.
steps.description: On levels you’ve previously completed, and on Yeti levels, a bag of coins will be rewarded to you when you complete it. A bag of coins can be worth as much as 3,500 coins.

methods.name: Growing Plants in the Zen Garden

steps.headline: Launch Plants vs Zombies 2.
steps.description: Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Tap on the watering can on the menu.
steps.description: This will bring you to the Zen Garden where you can grow plants equipped with plant food.

steps.headline: Plant.
steps.description: If you have an empty pot, tap on it to plant a plant. A random plant will be placed there. The plant will start as a baby or mini version of the plant.

steps.headline: Water the plants.
steps.description: Whenever you see a water droplet beside the plants, it means it’s time to water them. Tap on them to bring out the watering can.

steps.headline: Let the plants grow.
steps.description: The plants in the Zen Garden grow. Each time they grow, they give out coins as a reward for taking care of them. The plants’ growth is time-based, meaning you have to wait for the countdown to finish before they grow and before you can use them.

steps.headline: Collect the coins when the plants grow.
steps.description: Once a plant reaches its next growth point, it will release some coins for you to collect. Tap on the coins to add them to your coin bank. When a plant reaches its maturity and it’s now ready for use, it will release some gold coins.

steps.headline: Launch Plants vs Zombies 2.
steps.description: Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Tap on the “Play Event” button at the bottom of the screen to play it.
steps.description: Daily Events are special and unique games not found on any of the Worlds or Levels. These get refreshed every day. Once you completed a Daily Event, you can no longer play it again.

steps.headline: Complete the Event.
steps.description: Meet the goals of the Daily Event and defeat the zombies. You won’t get any reward if you aren’t successful.

steps.headline: Whack open 3 party piñatas.
steps.description: When you complete the Daily Event, you will be given a screen containing 16 party piñatas. Tap on three of these to uncover rewards. Rewards can range from a small amount of coins to 3,500 coins. They can also contain special plant costumes and gems.

steps.headline: Launch Plants vs Zombies 2.
steps.description: Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Tap on the shopping cart button on the top right corner of the screen.
steps.description: You will see the PvZ 2 Store with all the items for sale under the different tabs.

steps.headline: Tap on the Coins tab to see all the coin packages in the store.
steps.description: There are six different coin packages available, ranging from 5,000 coins at $2.99 to 450,000 coins at $99.99.

steps.headline: Buy a coin package.
steps.description: Do this by tapping on the price button for the coin package you want to buy.

steps.headline: Pay for your purchase.
steps.description: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete your purchase. If you’re using an iOS device, the iTunes Store will process your payment. If you’re using an Android device, the Google Checkout will do that. Once the purchase is completed, you will receive your coin package.
